name: Mortal Kombat Origins
description:
A 2 player Mortal Kombat game, only with Scorpion, Kitana, Mileena and SubZero. The characters move to left and right, punch and launch projectiles (different for all the characters).

Controls: First Player: Move - A,D / Punch - X / Projectile - Z; Second Player: Move - LArrow,RArrow / Punch - 1 / Projectile - 0.
